title: Look Into Each Other’s Eyes
detail_text: <:th_ch0006/>....and that’s what happened, we got into a fight because of it....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>So that’s what it was. Well.... Rather than who is in the wrong, it’s more of a.... misunderstanding, isn’t it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>I know that. But I was the one who raised my voice first<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>.... That’s true, but I think the timing was also bad<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Hey, Dia, how would you make up with them if you were me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Me? Let’s see.... I would look them in the eyes and say sorry, after all. It might be hard to have a face-to-face with them, but in the end, I think it is the easiest way to convey your feelings<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>....Is there any way where I don’t have to face them?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Maki-san.... Using that phone you’ve been gripping in your hand is buu buu desu wa<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Aaah, geez! I get it, okay! I’m going there now!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Fufu, I’m sure it will all work out<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
